website_summaries.verdict: Another inexpensive option for those wanting a simple, no-nonsense pogo jumper.
pros: Option to purchase in a fiery red or blue
Holds up to 250 pounds of weight
Handles and base made of soft foam
Includes storage bag for easy portability
cons: Smaller children who have a low weight should opt for another product

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is great for all- parents & kids- I like the high weight limit so we can all use it. This is a great toy. We have contests to see who can get the most bounces. Durable and fun!
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Fun
customer_reviews.text: Good, simple, easy, safe fun! Toddler loves it! Makes a fun squeaking sound every time he jumps! Keeps him occupied and having fun!
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Maybe for older kids?
customer_reviews.text: I have two kiddos a four-year-old and a six-year-old. My six-year-old loved this and was able to figure it out. My four-year-old had some trouble but I'm guessing he'll get it soon enough. It makes a cute squeaky noise once you press on it. It is quite a bit of a workout so they don't get on it too often. But I'm hoping it will help their core.
customer_reviews.author: MEM54

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed...
customer_reviews.text: Got it for my nephew, it came very very bent! It's messed up and now I'm not going to be able to get a replacement before Christmas. Very disappointed in the quality considering it seemed to be very sturdy looking in the pictures
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Terry

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: I ended up purchasing a second one after this order! I bought them as gifts for a 3 and 4 year old, they both loved them. Something different and active that they could use inside their home. The toy DOES squeak though!
customer_reviews.author: kristen guest

customer_reviews.title: Kids love it
customer_reviews.text: Kids loved it and seemed to play for hours with it
customer_reviews.author: Crazy shopper

customer_reviews.title: 4 year old loved this!
customer_reviews.text: My nephew loved this christmas gift and so did some of the adults! Amazingly durable and safe indoors!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: I gifted 2 of these to 2 girls and they loved it! I got this feedback from their mom
customer_reviews.author: KS

customer_reviews.title: Didnt care for it
customer_reviews.text: Very hars to use I got 2 for a 4 and 5 year old. Boy and girl. Both didnt use
customer_reviews.author: ShannonTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Not a fan
customer_reviews.text: My kids do not love this. And it squeaks really annoyingly
customer_reviews.author: Corinne

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Squeaker was broken so returned and bought another one. Squeaker broke right away on the second one.
customer_reviews.author: j.taylor

customer_reviews.title: Great fun!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for a 6 yr old and it was a hit for all the kids at his party!
customer_reviews.author: JRiff

customer_reviews.title: It's good for the price
customer_reviews.text: My 4 year old likes it well enough, but puts it down pretty fast. I've tried it and it's pretty cool for adults too.
customer_reviews.author: LJC

customer_reviews.title: Lots of fun
customer_reviews.text: My kids love the pogo hopper. It’s also a big hit as a birthday gift.
customer_reviews.author: DMcGraw

customer_reviews.title: Well made.
customer_reviews.text: Nice product. Ages 2 and 4 love it and use it in the house. Also ordered similar for 8 year old. Fun!
customer_reviews.author: swqlt

customer_reviews.title: Great toy for little ones.
customer_reviews.text: My three-year-old grandson loved it. He bounces all over the place
customer_reviews.author: Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: My six year old says you should buy it. It's fun to bounce and holds up really well even with her older nine year old brothers using it.
customer_reviews.author: Lzydaizy

customer_reviews.title: Happiness
customer_reviews.text: The toy was sturdy for my 2 year old. Even the 6 year old loves it. The toy was lots of fun.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Carson

customer_reviews.title: Great fun!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 4 year old son. He loves it! So far it is very durable. He can easily use it to jump around on. It does have a squeaker in it that squeaks with every jump. My son loves the sound and is having a lot of fun with this toy!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pogo
customer_reviews.text: Is nice and sturdy for a five year old who loves to jump.
customer_reviews.author: FIDE

customer_reviews.title: Best last minute gift!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this days before Christmas and it was a hit!!!
customer_reviews.author: Bridgette P

customer_reviews.title: Pogo Jumper way to small
customer_reviews.text: I bought this pogo jumper for my 5 yr old grandson, what I received was a jumper tall enough to fits my 2 yr, old grandson. This is way to short for a five-year-old, and no way will it hold 250lbs. Very disappointed, and I must return this jumper.
customer_reviews.author: Gloria Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Amazing gift for my nepjew,kno my when family wants one!!
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: Nothing
customer_reviews.text: Bought for 3 grandkids - twin 4year olds and a 3 year old. Twins loved it and took to it pretty quickly- 3 year old isn’t ready yet. Great gift.
customer_reviews.author: Mary N.

customer_reviews.title: Fun for everyone
customer_reviews.text: So much fun!! I bought it for my nephew, but all the adults tried it too
customer_reviews.author: Joeyc

customer_reviews.title: Durable & fun for many ages
customer_reviews.text: My children ages 3-9 enjoy these. They’ve held up well after several months of use. Even I can use them.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Toddler friendly
customer_reviews.text: The kids love bouncing on these. Adult friendly as well
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Alleman

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Such a great toy for the 3-5 age range!!! Makes a great gift!
customer_reviews.author: MJ

customer_reviews.title: Fun toy
customer_reviews.text: My son loves it but it stopped squeaking after 2 days of play
customer_reviews.author: Michael Hughes

customer_reviews.title: Such a fun toy
customer_reviews.text: Glad we bought this was perfect size for my 5 year old an I didn't realize that it can stretch to adjust to different hights. Very cool toy.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: U can play with it inside
customer_reviews.text: t first my grandson didn't like it. Now that he can play with it inside. He won't stay off of it.
customer_reviews.author: robin henson

product_meta.title: Joyin Toy Foam Pogo Jumper Safe and Fun Play, All sizes, 250 Pound Capacity (red)
feature_bullets: The Joyin Toy Foam Pogo Jumper is Great Toy for kid's Basic Physical Skills, Play Indoor and Outdoor
The Foam Pogo Jumper Has a Built in Squeaker that Makes a Funny sound.
Accommodate Children of all Sizes and Supports up to 250 Pounds. Great Christmas Toys Gift
Made From a soft Durable Foam Base, a Strong Stretchy bungee and Comfortable Foam Handles.
Easy to carry! Packed by Beautifull Zip Up Storage Bag with handles. Meets all CPSC Safety Standards. We Offer 30-day Money-Back Satisfaction Guarantee
